nodes.text: This battle droid was stationed on General Grievous's Providence-class carrier/destroyer during the Battle of Kamino.

Around 21 BBY, during the Battle of Kamino, this B1-Series battle droid along with other battle droids was under command of General Grievous on the deck of his command ship. After the general ordered all the ships in attack formation echo 3, T-series tactical droid TV-94B asked for a status report from all of the droids that were on the deck. This droid reported that the ship's Deflector shields were raised.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
